messages.subject: re: blood red moon
messages.msgSnippet: ... Robin - thank you!  I saw your post today in the digest version, and happen to be in a unique position to take advantage of this.  We are currently in
messages.messageBody:
Robin wrote:
>We could be in for a spectacular sight .
>http://news.excite.com/news/r/000115/11/space-eclipse
>http://sunearth.gsfc.nasa.gov/eclipse/eclipse.html
>http://sunearth.gsfc.nasa.gov/eclipse/SEextra/TLE2000Jan20.html


Robin - thank you! I saw your post today in the digest version, and
happen to be in a unique position to take advantage of this. We are
currently in Flagstaff, Arizona on vacation (I know, I can't stay away
from email even on vacation). This is the home of the Lowell Observatory,
which is historically famous for having discovered the Planet Pluto!
I wasn't aware of this lunar eclipse, so I called the Lowell Observatory
(which we weren't planning on visiting until Saturday night) and found
out they have a program Thursday night all about the eclipse!

So thank you VERY MUCH for this unique opportunity, and I'll let you
know how it turns out!

Robin
Orlando, FL (usually)
:-)
